verses.verse: Bless <WH1288> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> O my soul.<WH5315> O LORD<WH3068> my God,<WH430> thou art very<WH3966> great;<WH1431> thou art clothed<WH3847> with honor<WH1935> and majesty.<WH1926>
Who coverest<WH5844> thyself with light<WH216> as with a garment:<WH8008> who stretchest out<WH5186> the heavens<WH8064> like a curtain: <WH3407>

Who layeth the beams<WH7136> of his chambers<WH5944> in the waters:<WH4325> who maketh<WH7760> the clouds<WH5645> his chariot:<WH7398> who walketh<WH1980> upon<WH5921> the wings<WH3671> of the wind: <WH7307>
Who maketh<WH6213> his angels<WH4397> spirits;<WH7307> his ministers<WH8334> a flaming<WH3857> fire: <WH784>
Who laid<WH3245> <WH5921> the foundations<WH4349> of the earth,<WH776> that it should not<WH1077> be removed<WH4131> forever.<WH5769> <WH5703>
Thou coveredst<WH3680> it with the deep<WH8415> as with a garment:<WH3830> the waters<WH4325> stood<WH5975> above<WH5921> the mountains.<WH2022>
At <WH4480> thy rebuke<WH1606> they fled;<WH5127> at<WH4480> the voice<WH6963> of thy thunder<WH7482> they hasted away.<WH2648>
They go up<WH5927> by the mountains;<WH2022> they go down<WH3381> by the valleys<WH1237> unto<WH413> the place<WH4725> which<WH2088> thou hast founded<WH3245> for them.
Thou hast set<WH7760> a bound<WH1366> that they may not<WH1077> pass over;<WH5674> that they turn not again<WH7725> <WH1077> to cover<WH3680> the earth.<WH776>
He sendeth<WH7971> the springs<WH4599> into the valleys,<WH5158> which run<WH1980> among<WH996> the hills.<WH2022>
They give drink<WH8248> to every<WH3605> beast<WH2416> of the field:<WH7704> the wild asses<WH6501> quench<WH7665> their thirst.<WH6772>
By <WH5921> them shall the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven<WH8064> have their habitation,<WH7931> which sing<WH5414> <WH6963> among<WH4480> <WH996> the branches.<WH6073>
He watereth<WH8248> the hills<WH2022> from his chambers:<WH4480> <WH5944> the earth<WH776> is satisfied<WH7646> with the fruit<WH4480> <WH6529> of thy works.<WH4639>

He causeth the grass<WH2682> to grow<WH6779> for the cattle,<WH929> and herb<WH6212> for the service<WH5656> of man:<WH120> that he may bring forth<WH3318> food<WH3899> out of<WH4480> the earth;<WH776>

And wine<WH3196> that maketh glad<WH8055> the heart<WH3824> of man,<WH582> and oil<WH4480> <WH8081> to make his face<WH6440> to shine,<WH6670> and bread<WH3899> which strengtheneth<WH5582> man's<WH582> heart.<WH3824>
The trees<WH6086> of the LORD<WH3068> are full<WH7646> of sap; the cedars<WH730> of Lebanon,<WH3844> which<WH834> he hath planted;<WH5193>
Where <WH834> <WH8033> the birds<WH6833> make their nests:<WH7077> as for the stork,<WH2624> the fir trees<WH1265> are her house.<WH1004>
The high<WH1364> hills<WH2022> are a refuge<WH4268> for the wild goats;<WH3277> and the rocks<WH5553> for the conies.<WH8227>
He appointed<WH6213> the moon<WH3394> for seasons:<WH4150> the sun<WH8121> knoweth<WH3045> his going down.<WH3996>
Thou makest<WH7896> darkness,<WH2822> and it is<WH1961> night:<WH3915> wherein all<WH3605> the beasts<WH2416> of the forest<WH3293> do creep<WH7430> forth.
The young lions<WH3715> roar<WH7580> after their prey,<WH2964> and seek<WH1245> their meat<WH400> from God.<WH4480> <WH410>
The sun<WH8121> ariseth,<WH2224> they gather themselves together,<WH622> and lay them down<WH7257> in<WH413> their dens.<WH4585>
Man <WH120> goeth forth<WH3318> unto his work<WH6467> and to his labor<WH5656> until<WH5704> the evening.<WH6153>
O LORD,<WH3068> how<WH4100> manifold<WH7231> are thy works!<WH4639> in wisdom<WH2451> hast thou made<WH6213> them all:<WH3605> the earth<WH776> is full<WH4390> of thy riches.<WH7075>

So is this<WH2088> great<WH1419> and wide<WH7342> <WH3027> sea,<WH3220> wherein<WH8033> are things creeping<WH7431> innumerable,<WH369> <WH4557> both small<WH6996> and<WH5973> great<WH1419> beasts.<WH2416>
There <WH8033> go<WH1980> the ships:<WH591> there is that leviathan,<WH3882> whom thou<WH2088> hast made<WH3335> to play<WH7832> therein.
These wait<WH7663> all<WH3605> upon<WH413> thee; that thou mayest give<WH5414> them their meat<WH400> in due season.<WH6256>
That thou givest<WH5414> them they gather:<WH3950> thou openest<WH6605> thine hand,<WH3027> they are filled<WH7646> with good.<WH2896>
Thou hidest<WH5641> thy face,<WH6440> they are troubled:<WH926> thou takest away<WH622> their breath,<WH7307> they die,<WH1478> and return<WH7725> to<WH413> their dust.<WH6083>
Thou sendest forth<WH7971> thy spirit,<WH7307> they are created:<WH1254> and thou renewest<WH2318> the face<WH6440> of the earth.<WH127>
The glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> shall endure<WH1961> forever:<WH5769> the LORD<WH3068> shall rejoice<WH8055> in his works.<WH4639>
He looketh<WH5027> on the earth,<WH776> and it trembleth:<WH7460> he toucheth<WH5060> the hills,<WH2022> and they smoke.<WH6225>
I will sing<WH7891> unto the LORD<WH3068> as long as I live:<WH2416> I will sing praise<WH2167> to my God<WH430> while I have my being.<WH5750>
My meditation<WH7879> of<WH5921> him shall be sweet:<WH6149> I<WH595> will be glad<WH8055> in the LORD.<WH3068>

Let the sinners<WH2400> be consumed<WH8552> out of<WH4480> the earth,<WH776> and let the wicked<WH7563> be no<WH369> more.<WH5750> Bless<WH1288> thou<WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> O my soul.<WH5315> Praise<WH1984> ye the LORD.<WH3050>
